qas.question: Whitehead's education style was to teach what?
What should Whitehead's students organically link due to his teaching methods?

answers.text: different areas of knowledge, discovering their application in actual life.

qas.question: Whitehead believed education should be the opposite of what?
What did Whitehead believe regarding the variety of subjects in education?

answers.text: Whitehead advocated teaching a relatively few important concepts

qas.question: How did Whitehead propose that students would expand their knowledge beyond the subjects taught in school?

answers.text: important concepts that the student could organically link to many different areas of knowledge, discovering their application in actual life

qas.question: What was Whitehead's general opinion of what the school model should be?

answers.text: For Whitehead, education should be the exact opposite of the multidisciplinary, value-free school model

qas.question: What was Whitehead's opinion on the inclusion of values and general principles in education?

answers.text: it should be transdisciplinary, and laden with values and general principles that provide students with a bedrock of wisdom

plausible_answers.text: important concepts that the student could organically link

qas.question: How did Whitehead reject that students would expand their knowledge beyond the subjects taught in school?
What was Whitehead's opinion on the inclusion of values and general principles in noneducation?

plausible_answers.text: advocated teaching a relatively few important concepts that the student could organically link to many different areas of knowledge

qas.question: What did Whitehead believe regarding the lack of variety of subjects in education?

plausible_answers.text: education should be the exact opposite of the multidisciplinary

qas.question: What was Whitehead's general opinion of what the school model shouldn't be?

context: Thay vì dạy những phần nhỏ của một số lượng lớn các môn học, <a3_0> Whitehead <b9_0> giảng dạy ủng hộ <a0_0> một số ít <a4_0><b7_0> khái niệm quan trọng <a3_0/><a0_0/> mà học sinh có thể liên kết hữu cơ <b7_0/> đến nhiều <a1_0> các lĩnh vực kiến ​​thức khác nhau <b9_0/> , khám phá ứng dụng của họ trong cuộc sống thực <a4_0/> . <a1_0/><a5_0> Đối với Whitehead, <b10_0> giáo dục nên là đối lập chính xác của ngành đa ngành <b10_0/> , <a2_0> mô hình trường học không có giá trị <a5_0/><a2_0/> - - <a6_0> nó <b8_0> nên được xuyên ngành <b8_0/> , và đầy những giá trị và nguyên tắc chung cung cấp cho sinh viên nền tảng trí tuệ <a6_0/> và giúp họ kết nối giữa các lĩnh vực tri thức thường được coi là riêng biệt.
